summary:
**Sonic the Hedgehog 3** is an action-adventure movie coming in 2024. It's based on the popular Sega video games. Jim Carrey, Ben Schwartz, and others return to voice characters. This time, Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles team up with Dr. Robotnik to fight a new villain, Shadow the Hedgehog.

The movie started filming in 2023 in England and will hit theaters on December 20, 2024. It's inspired by the game *Sonic Adventure 2*.
title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 (film)
